return_method_desc: Traced by member of the public
circumstances: Chloe Sanders was last seen by her sister before she boarded a bus heading toward 224-226 Archerhill Road, Glasgow. She was expected to meet her friend, Trevor Smith, but never arrived at the intended location. Her last known address was near the 55 Diana Avenue, Glasgow. Trevor, worried after Chloe failed to join him, checked the nearby skate park and her part-time job but found no trace of her. The search expanded to the surrounding roadhouse and areas Chloe often visited. Eventually, Chloe was located on a cruise ship docked at Acre Drive, Glasgow. A member of the public found her and reported it to the authorities, leading to her safe return. Despite the high initial risk level, Chloe was unharmed and reunited with her family.
entities_addresses: 55 Diana Avenue Glasgow,Avenue Glasgow,Archerhill Road Glasgow,Acre Drive Glasgow,Avenue Glasgow

circumstances: Chloe Sanders, a 13-year-old girl, went missing from her home at 52a Sinclair Street, Helensburgh. She had recently been released from a care facility and from prison, which had caused some tension at home. Chloe's aunt noticed her absence and contacted the police, concerned for her niece's safety. Several people, including her uncle and Samantha Evans, reported seeing her near Belsyde Avenue, where it's believed she was trying to avoid attention. Chloe was eventually traced by the police at 1a The Auld Road. Though initially a medium risk case, she was found safe, leading to a reassessment to a low-risk status.
